thread.title: Nordstrom Earnings, Retail Sales on Tap for Thursday
thread.title_full: Nordstrom Earnings, Retail Sales on Tap for Thursday

title: Nordstrom Earnings, Retail Sales on Tap for Thursday
text:
Nordstrom Earnings, Retail Sales on Tap for Thursday By U-Jin Lee | 08/12/15 - 08:15 PM EDT Reprint 
NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- A number of retailers will be reporting Thursday, and retail sales will also be announced. 
Before the opening come Kohl's ( KSS - Get Report ) , Coty ( COTY - Get Report ) , and Advance Auto Parts ( AAP - Get Report ) followed by Applied Materials ( AMAT - Get Report ) and Nordstrom ( JWN - Get Report ) after the close. 
Nordstrom is expected to report earnings of 90 cents a share on revenue of $3.67 billion, according to analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters . Investors will pay close attention to how it will perform as the strong dollar has been putting pressure on tourism. 
TheStreet's Jim Cramer said Nordstrom has a great growth division in Nordstrom Rack and the company has spent billions of dollars on developing its website. Overall, it has a "compelling story to tell," but that being said, "retail sales have been horrendous," he added. 
Must Read: 7 Stocks Jim Cramer Has Found Amid the Stock Market Rubble 
The question is whether or not Nordstrom's earnings results will be similar to Macy's ( M ) quarterly results , as its earnings missed analysts' estimates on both the top and bottom line. Cramer noted that Nordstrom must distinguish itself as a company. 
The U.S. economic calendar includes retail sales for the month of July and jobless claims at 8:30 a.m. ET followed by the July business inventories report at 10 a.m. ET. Business inventories, or the dollar amount of inventories held by manufacturers, wholesalers and retailers, is forecast to rise 0.3%. Check Out Our Best Services for Investors 
Portfolio Manager Jim Cramer and Director of Research Jack Mohr reveal their investment tactics while giving advanced notice before every trade. Product Features:
